meta.title: Meilisearch
meta.description: An open-source, blazingly fast, and hyper-relevant search engine that will improve your search experience

hero.title: Shape a delightful search experience in a snap
hero.description: An open-source, lightning-fast, and hyper-relevant search engine that fits effortlessly into your apps, websites, and workflow.

demo.title: The next generation of search
demo.description: Meilisearch is a flexible and powerful user-focused search engine that can be added to any website or application.

keypoints.title: Lightning fast
keypoints.description: Search-as-you-type returns answers in less than 50 milliseconds. That's faster than the blink of an eye!

keypoints.title: Plug ‘n play
keypoints.description: Deploy in a matter of minutes. Smart presets let you start searching through your data with zero configuration.

keypoints.title: Flexible
keypoints.description: Send data to Meilisearch however you want—no need to match a schema or convert your dataset to a compatible format.

keypoints.title: Typo tolerant
keypoints.description: Everyone makes mistakes! If typos break your search experience, many users will leave thinking what they were looking for just wasn't there.

openSource.title: Nothing good is built alone
openSource.description: Join our welcoming and fast growing community.

steps.title: Connect
steps.description: Start searching through your dataset in less than 5 minutes and quickly connect your codebase to Meilisearch with our official libraries.

steps.title: Customize
steps.description: Meilisearch is designed to work out-of-the-box, no configuration needed. But we know every project is different, so we made it easy to customize your instance in just a few minutes.

cards.title: Filters
cards.description: Enhance your user's search experience with custom filters and build a faceted search interface in a few lines of code.

cards.title: Geo search
cards.description: Search in the real world. No need for a PhD, we've got you covered.

cards.title: Language detection
cards.description: Meilisearch supports all languages and detects them automatically.

cards.title: Sort by
cards.description: Sort results based on price, date, or pretty much anything else your users need.

cards.title: Custom relevancy
cards.description: Let's break the rules. Use our default ranking rules or create your own.

cards.title: API keys
cards.description: Secure your data with API keys that allow fine-grained permissions management.

firstSection.title: Open Source
firstSection.description:
Did we tell you that everything we do is completely public? Start using Meilisearch now by downloading our open source version.

You can also deploy Meilisearch on any cloud provider such as AWS, GCP or DigitalOcean with our integrations. Use Meilisearch however you want: it's all up to you.

secondSection.title: Cloud
secondSection.description:
Need to go fast? Meilisearch Cloud takes care of everything so you just have to focus on the most important thing: making sure your users have a great search experience.

Enter the waiting list for our Cloud beta by completing the form linked below.

developer.title:
The best developer
experience
developer.description: At Meilisearch, we take the developer experience to heart. That's why we work hard to make our API self-explanatory and develop our SDKs to let you concentrate on what matters the most.
developer.documentationText: Every developer knows there's nothing worse than outdated, disorganized, or incomplete documentation. Our team of technical writers works hard to ensure that our documentation isn't just accurate; it's exceptional.
developer.developerHubText: Everything you need to help you with meilisearch is here.

cards.title: Join the community
cards.description: Join our community and help us make fast and relevant search accessible to everyone. Whether you are a contributor, a user, or you just need answers to questions about Meilisearch, we are here for you.

cards.title: GitHub
cards.description: Open issues and PRs, request new features, and vote on the ones that matter the most to you!

cards.title: Slack
cards.description: Join us on our team chat and ask questions!

cards.title: Roadmap
cards.description: Check what we will be working on in the next few weeks!

testimonials.description: Already 25k users have been convinced by Meilisearch. How about giving it a try?
